body: I wonder if this got canceled/axed, since it has been almost 3 months since the first chapter. Also, looks like it has alreaby been translated to spanish, kinda weird that there's no english version yet.

So basically if im reading this right( i dont know japanese yet)  you use your slut to make the other opponent cum to best of her ability without resorting to full on sex, and he does the same to you, you can use spell or trap cards to limit the sexiness of the other slut or stop her altogether, first person to cum loses.

sounds really interesting and i can already see a jealousy plot forming here, is this a new series? Mizuryu kei land is over so i hope this is his next big thing.

The potential for NTR is really high though, hes the artist and can do as he pleases, but lets hope he dosen't go that route.
Like the concept wish it'd go somewhere
I'm waiting Mizuryu kei land 7th day for months!
Cant wait for translation...but Im waiting Mizuryu kei land 7th day for months so...I dont know how to feel.
God damn the new Y**hiOh season looks lit.
Can't wait for the one on motorcycles
i know i have said it before, but i will say it again...i can't fap to this... THERE'S NO SEX
i know i have said it before, but i will say it again...Nobody gives a fuck...A T T E N T I O N W H O R E
